attributes.action: Lock the meal deal prices, we've seen enough lads
attributes.additional_details: The meal deal is an iconic part of British history. We should PRESERVE that and therefore making them easier and cheaper to obtain. My personal budget for food has increased a whole 35£ in two years. When you have to pay for your flat and your family this is a VERY important petition for working-class citizens.
attributes.background: The price of the so-called "meal-deal" has skyrocketed, media reports say. This makes it harder for us individuals to get a tasty but cheap lunch. I personally need it for my job as a construction worker in Stafford when we have our lunch break.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the price of meal deals are a matter for individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
